thread.title: Man shot in hand while walking down 122nd in SE Portland
thread.title_full: Man shot in hand while walking down 122nd in SE Portland | OregonLive.com

author: Andrew Theen | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Man shot in hand while walking down 122nd in SE Portland
text:
A 24-year-old man was shot in the hand Wednesday morning while walking down Portland's Southeast 122nd Avenue.
The man suffered injuries that didn't threaten his life, and he was taken to a hospital.
According to police, the victim was walking along 122 nd near Powell Boulevard in the Powellhurst-Gilbert neighborhood when he was unexpectedly hit in the hand by a bullet.
Officers responded shortly after noon, but the man said he couldn't identify where the shot came from or who fired the bullet.
Police requested anyone with information to call the assault detectives at 503-823-0400.
-- Andrew Theen
atheen@oregonian.com
503-294-4026
@cityhallwatch
